An absolute unit of an asymmetrical experience. Whether you’re playing Survivor or Killer—it won’t matter, there are petulant whiners on both sides who will assure you that both sides are broken. Don’t get caught up in metas or supposed etiquette—malleable properties have no place here. Play the way you want to play. Play to have fun. Fuck everyone else.

Be the change you want to see.
Morality and fairness can suck it.
